Module.Name: appmsw-dbdeploy
Module.Description: An example of deploying solutions with prepared databases, even without source code.

Author.Notes: repository: https://github.com/SergeyMi37/appmsw-dbdeploy description: An example of deploying a solution with databases from the archive. (Can be expanded without source codes).

Module.AfterInstallMessage: You can protect your solution by deleting the source code. Create an archive for database deployment and move it outside the container. In a new instance, you can create a database from the archive with a new name. https://github.com/SergeyMi37/appmsw-dbdeploy/blob/master/README.md
